content: Seen this today on twitter thought I would share it here! It looks like Samson Mow was handing them out at Lugano Plan BTC I assume he is good friends with Bobby Lee the chip is very similar to the btcc chips. It would be nice if some of these made their way to the forum ¬† I wish ballet would make some chips like this!!!
